queries.query:
hostFilter = (tables=<-) =>
  if v.Host != "(All)" then
    tables |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == v.Host)
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> hostFilter()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / (24 * 60 * 60)}))
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> last()
  |> lowestMin(n:1)

from(bucket: "_monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statuses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "_message")
  |> group(columns: ["_check_id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_level"] == "crit")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "_monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statuses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "_message")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_level", as: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == "ok" then 0 else if r._value == "info" then 1 else if r._value == "warn" then 2 else 3 }))
  |> group(columns: ["_check_id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_check_name","_level","_value"])

controllerHosts = from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_controller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ActiveControllerCount.Value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.host}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

controllerHostNames = controllerHosts |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "_value")

from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_topics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MessagesInPerSec.Count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not contains(value: r.host, set: controllerHostNames))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "host", "role"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

manints = from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node_config")
  |> hostFilter()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "monint")
  |> distinct()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])

traffic = from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> hostFilter()
  |> roleFilter()
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "_value": r._value * 8.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["host"])

join.inner(left: traffic, right: manints,
  on: (l,r) => l.interface == r._value,
  as: (l, r) => ({l with _value: l._value, result: "bytes_recv"}))
